title: Royal Rebel
description:
Can an arranged marriage end up being the greatest love of my life?
TristanI knew what I would get when I turned twenty-five.A wife.A monarchy.And to be honest, I wasn't sure I wanted either one of them.AmeliaAt twenty-three I knew it was my duty to serve.A King.The people.The one thing I never counted on? Falling in love with my husband.
author: Laramie Briscoe
